pages.disclaimers: CricketFever - Legal Disclaimers CricketFever About Download App FAQ's Disclaimers Introduction Welcome to CricketFever. By using our fantasy sports platform, you acknowledge and agree to the following disclaimers: Risks and Responsibilities Participating in fantasy sports involves financial risk. You may lose money based on the performance of selected players. It is your responsibility to ensure legal compliance with local laws regarding online gaming and fantasy sports. We encourage responsible gaming practices. Do not wager more than you can afford to lose. Platform Usage CricketFever is a platform for entertainment purposes only. It does not guarantee winnings or income opportunities. We do not endorse excessive or compulsive gambling behaviors. Seek help if you believe you may have a gambling problem. Users must be of legal age in their jurisdiction to participate in fantasy sports on CricketFever. Changes to Disclaimers We reserve the right to update or modify these disclaimers at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page. The CricketFever website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline CricketFever Fantasy cricket has become a popular pastime, attracting enthusiasts of all ages. Download our new fantasy app for your mobile device today and experience the excitement! Disclaimers Privacy & Policy Terms & Conditions DISCLAIMER Participation in fantasy sports involves financial risk and may lead to addiction. Please play responsibly. CricketFever offers fantasy sports games that carry financial risks and may be addictive. Fantasy sports are not promoted as employment or income opportunities. Play responsibly and at your own risk. The platform is not liable for violations of rules, terms, or laws.
pages.privacy: CricketFever - Privacy Policy CricketFever About Download App FAQ's Privacy Policy Introduction Welcome to CricketFever! We are committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services. Information We Collect We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and payment details when you create an account or make transactions on CricketFever. We also collect usage data and cookies to improve our services. How We Use Your Information We use your information to provide and personalize our services, communicate with you, process transactions, and comply with legal obligations. We do not sell your information to third parties. Information Security We implement security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access and maintain data accuracy. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We encourage you to review this policy periodically for any changes. Changes are effective when they are posted on this page. The CricketFever website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. pages.terms: CricketFever - Terms and Conditions CricketFever About Download App FAQ's Terms and Conditions Introduction Welcome to CricketFever! These terms and conditions govern your use of our fantasy sports platform and services. By accessing or using CricketFever, you agree to comply with these terms and our privacy policy. Use of the Platform CricketFever provides a platform for users to participate in fantasy sports leagues based on real-life events. Users must create an account to participate. Accounts are personal and non-transferable. Users must be at least 18 years old or of legal age in their jurisdiction to participate. Responsibilities Users are responsible for the accuracy of their account information and must not impersonate others. Users must comply with all applicable laws and regulations while using CricketFever. Users agree not to engage in any fraudulent or unlawful activities on the platform. Changes to Terms We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on the website.
